summary: Email from an Assistant United States Attorney to Robert Glassman regarding a sealed Rule 412 motion filed in the Southern District of New York, with a potential in camera hearing scheduled for November 5, 2021.

persons.name: Robert Glassman
persons.role: Recipient of email, likely legal professional
persons.context: Addressed in an email from an Assistant United States Attorney regarding a sealed Rule 412 motion and potential hearing.

events.title: Rule 412 Motion Filed Under Seal
events.description: A Rule 412 motion was filed under seal, with a response due to be filed under seal on the following Monday.

events.title: Potential In Camera Hearing
events.description: If the Court holds a hearing on the Rule 412 motion, it will be conducted in camera on this date.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A Rule 412 motion was filed under seal in the Southern District of New York.
The motion and response are both being handled under seal, indicating sensitive or confidential material.
A potential in camera hearing on the motion was scheduled for November 5, 2021.
